shortcontents.shortcontent:
I) Nägärä Maryam “The Story of Mary” (fols. 2ra-150ra) I-1) Reading for St. Anne's Conception of Mary, the Nativity of Mary, Mary's entry into the temple (fols. 2ra-17vb) I-2) Reading for the 21st of Gǝnbot (fols. 18ra-45va) I-3) Reading for the 21st of Säne (fols. 45vb-54ra) I-4) Reading for the 21st of Ḥamle (fols. 54rb-61ra) I-5) Reading for the 7th of Näḥase (fols. 62rb-68va) I-6) Reading for the 21st of Näḥase (fols. 68vb-70va) I-7) Reading for the 21st of Mäskäräm (fols. 70vb-73rb) I-8) Reading for the 21st of Ṭǝqǝmt (fols. 73va-82ra) I-9) Reading for the 21st of Ḫǝdar (fols. 82rb-87rb) I-10) Reading for the 21st of Taḥśaś (fols. 87rb-94rb) I-11) Reading for the 21st of Ṭǝrr (fols. 94va-104vb) I-12) Reading for the 21st of Yäkkatit (fols. 105ra-112ra) I-13) Reading for the 21st of Mäggabit (fols. 112rb-120vb) I-14) Reading for the 21st of Miyazya (fols. 121ra-123va) I-15) Reading added to every month (fols. 123va-150ra)
Additiones 1-5.

copyists.copyist: The name of the scribe Wäldä <...> (?) has been erased from the supplication formulas on fol. 123rb, 132vb, 149vb.

donors.donor: Additio 2 mentions Wäldä Bǝrhan as the donor. His name is also written over erasure in many supplication formulas (e.g., fols. 54rb, 68vb, 82ra, 94rb, 105ra, 127rb), in the same hand as Additio 2. But Additio 3 mentions another person, Zä-Mänfäs Qǝddus, as the donor. His name is also written over erasure and interlineally in many supplication formulas (e.g. fols. 2rb, 17vb, 68vb, 87ra, 99rb, 11ra, 132vb, 149vb), in the same hand as Additio 3. The names of his relatives are also mentioned (s. Varia).

dcomments.dcomment: 18th century. Zä-Mänfäs Qǝddus is the baptismal name of däğğazmač Subagadis or Säbagadis, the ruler of Tǝgray in 1822-31

txstates.txstate: The Ms. was treated in the same way as some other Mss. of the collection, e.g. QS-014. The Ms was resewn, a new leather cover was laid on the boards upon the original covering (with fine tooled ornamentation). The boards were placed in the reversed way, the outer side becoming the inner side. A few leaves are slightly stained with water (e.g., fols. 144r, 145r). The upper part of fol. 80 is cut.

bindings.binding: Two wooden boards covered with deep-crimson tooled leather; two covers of reddish-brown tooled leather have been inserted under the turn-ins of the front and back board. Two pairs of sewing stations.

bndecorations.bndecoration: Blind tooled ornament on the deep crimson leather cover (at least 5 tools were used: triple line fillet, double circle, criss cross, wave form with dots, small x).

bnothers.bnother: Two pairs of chains of the endband stitches at the spine cover.

squires.squire: I፩(9; s.l.: 1, stub after 9/fols. 1r-9v) – II፪(8/fols. 10r-17v) – III፫(8/fols. 18r-25v) – IV፬(8/fols. 26r-33v) – V፭(8/fols. 34r-41v) - VI፮(8/fols. 42r-49v) – VII፯(8/fols. 50r-57v) – VIII፰(8/fols. 58r-65v) – IX፱(12/fols. 66r-77v) – X፲(8/fols. 78r-85v) – XI፲፩(8/fols. 86r-93v) – XII፲፪(8/fols. 94r-101v) – XIII፲፫(8/fols. 102r-109v) – XIV፲፬(12/fols. 110r-121v) – XV(12/fols. 122r-133v) – ፲፭XVI(12/fols. 134r-145v) – ፲፮XVII(5; s.l.: 1, stub after 5; 2, stub after 5; 3, stub after 5/fols. 146r-150v).

taunit.rl-info: Ruling and pricking are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

Ruling and pricking are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

Ruling and pricking are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

pchangeofhands.pchangeofhand: Hand a: fols. 2r-121v (quires I-XIV). Hand b: fols. 122r-150v (quires XV-XVII), characterized by thick, right-sloping letters. It is possible that one more hand is involved in writing fols. 78r-121v (quires X-XIV).

rubrications.rubrication: Nomina sacra, two lines or two groups of lines on the incipit pages of all readings, alternating with black lines; two lines of each subsection of Text I-14, alternating with black lines; elements of the punctuation signs, of the text dividers and of the quire marks; elements of Ethiopic numerals.

additional.det: The note is written in a crude hand in blue pen. Some directives (e.g., yǝbǝl) are written in red pen.

additional.cont: Fol. 150ra: Donation note.
additional.det: The note is written in vermillion ink in a crude hand. It states that ʾabba Wäldä Bǝrhan donated the book to the church of (Qälaqǝl Maryam) Ṣǝyon.

additional.cont: Fol. 150rb: Donation note.
additional.det: The note is written in reddish-brown ink and states that Zä-Mänfäs Qǝddus acquired the book and donated it to the church of (Qälaqǝl Maryam) Ṣǝyon. After the word ʾamen, there is an addition made in a different crude hand, in Amharic, mentioning several individuals and local dignitaries, among them qäň ʾazmač Kasay, mämhǝre Täklä Maryam, mämhǝre Gäbrä Ḥǝywät, mämhǝre Gäbrä Maryam and others (possibly witnesses of the donation, or of another transaction). At the end, the names of the scribe and commissioner of the note (?) are indicated: Getaye Wäldu and Wäldä ʿAbiyä ʾƎgziʾ ʾƎdä Šǝhte (?)

additional.cont: Fol. 150va-b: Directives for ministers (?)
additional.det: The note is written in blue pen in the same hand as Additio 1. Some directives (e.g., yǝbǝl kahǝn) are written in red pen. The note is partly legible.

extras.extra: - Tämälläs-sign, in the shape of a cross (+), indicating the place where the omission, written in the upper margin, belongs: fol. 115ra. - Omitted letters or words inserted interlineally in black ink: e.g., fols. 3va, 16rb, 28rb, 47va, 68va, 92rb, 115ra, 141va. - Omitted letters inserted interlineally in vivid vermillion ink: e.g., 4rb, 10va, 19vb. - Omitted letters inserted interlineally in reddish-brown ink: e.g., 9ra, 13ra, 40ra. - Erasure: fol. 18vb. - Corrections written over erasures in the main hand: e.g., fols. 8ra, 16rb, 40vb, 47va, 58va, 92va, 136va. - Several names are written in the supplication formulas in a secondary hand over an erased name: Wäldä Bǝrhan, in vermillion ink (e.g., fols. 54rb, 70va, 82ra, 94va, 104vb, 127rb); Zä-Mänfäs Qǝddus, in reddish-brown ink (e.g., fols. 2ra, 54rb, 87ra, 104vb, 121ra, 133ra); his father Wäldä Lǝʿul (e.g., fol. 2rb, 54rb, 68vb, 94rb, 149vb), his mother Wälättä Ṣǝyon (fols. 2rb, 68vb, 73rb); Täsfa Maryam (fols. 17vb, 112ra), Gäbrä Ṣadǝq (fols. 45vb, 105ra), Wäldä Mikaʾel (fols. 45va, 112rb, 132vb).

txquiremarks.txquiremark: - Undecorated quire marks are written in the right upper margin of fols. 9v: ፩, 17v: ፪, 25v: ፫, 33v: ፬, 41v: ፭, 49v: ፮, 57v: ፯, 65v: ፰, 77v: ፱, 85v: ፲, 93v: ፲፩, 101v: ፲፪, 109v: ፲፫, 121v: ፲፬, 134r: ፲፭ (here in the left upper margin), 146r: ፲፮ (here in the left upper margin).

txfindingaids.txfindingaid: - Readings are indicated by dates written in frames in the upper margin: ዘጽንሰታ፡ ወዘልደታ፡ ወዘበአታ፡ ምንባብ፡ fol. 2r (in a recent hand in blue pen) የበአታ፡ ማርያም፡ ምንባብ፡ fol. 7rb (in a recent hand in blue pen) አመ፡ ፳ወ፩ለግንቦት፡ fol. 18ra አመ፡ ፳ወ፩ለሠኔ፡ fol. 45vb አመ፡ ፳ወ፩ለሐምሌ፡ fol. 54rb አመ፡ ፯ለነሐሴ፡ fol. 62rb አመ፡ ፳ወ፩ለነሐሴ፡ fol. 68vb አመ፡ ፳ወ፩ለመሥከረም፡ fol. 70vb አመ፡ ፳ወ፩ለጥቅምት፡ fol. 73va አመ፡ ፳ወ፩ለህዳር፡ fol. 82rb አመ፡ ፳ወ፩ለታኅሣሥ፡ fol. 87rb አመ፡ ፳ወ፩ለጥር፡ fol. 94va አመ፡ ፳ወ፩ለየካቲት፡ fol. 105ra አመ፡ ፳ወ፩ለመጋቢት፡ fol. 112rb አመ፡ ፳ወ፩ለሚያዝያ፡ fol. 121ra.
